nodes.text: Lanius Carr was a Human male who served in the Corellian Security Force during the renewed conflict between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. When the Corellia Chemical Corporation factory in Labor Valley was damaged in the fighting and became dangerously close to overloading, Lanius tasked a Republic hero to stop this disaster before thousands of innocent Corellians could be lost in the chemical explosion.
